item.description:
A bunch of us will be crafting so bring your latest project and join us. I may be decoupaging some piggy banks, making up some jewelry or maybe creating some fabric flowers -- not sure yet.

At 12pm, we'll be hosting a "Make a bracelet or necklace session" where we will teach how to crimp to add a clasp to finish your piece. Materials not included but the instruction is free.

Hope to see you there. The meetup ends at 4:00pm so you are welcome to come and go as you please.
Lisa

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: FREE Meetup
